timeline.bodyText: this looks weird. Your fork is not going to be updated. Reason for such integration is to check latest master, isn't it?
timeline.author: strkkk
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -244,10 +244,12 @@ no-error-spring-cloud-gcp)
   CS_POM_VERSION=$(mvn -e -q -Dexec.executable='echo' -Dexec.args='${project.version}' \
                      --non-recursive org.codehaus.mojo:exec-maven-plugin:1.3.1:exec)
   echo CS_version: ${CS_POM_VERSION}
-  checkout_from https://github.com/spring-cloud/spring-cloud-gcp
+  checkout_from https://github.com/romani/spring-cloud-gcp

replies.bodyText:
Upstream repository is not ready yet for execution on latest checkstyle.
Reason spring-cloud/spring-cloud-gcp#2540
Ones it is resolved, we can start using upstream.
Reason of such validation is to use real code for testing. We can use any project , even forked, even with strict version. But ideally, yes, master HEAD.
replies.author: romani

timeline.bodyText: same thing here. It is not going to be updated.
timeline.author: strkkk
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -244,10 +244,12 @@ no-error-spring-cloud-gcp)
   CS_POM_VERSION=$(mvn -e -q -Dexec.executable='echo' -Dexec.args='${project.version}' \
                      --non-recursive org.codehaus.mojo:exec-maven-plugin:1.3.1:exec)
   echo CS_version: ${CS_POM_VERSION}
-  checkout_from https://github.com/spring-cloud/spring-cloud-gcp
+  checkout_from https://github.com/romani/spring-cloud-gcp
   cd .ci-temp/spring-cloud-gcp
+  git checkout romani-patch-1

replies.bodyText: As soon they update their code to use their latest checkstyle config.
replies.author: romani

timeline.bodyText:
comment for disabling says
disabled till project upgrade to new checkstyle maven plugin
if we pass plugin version in cli, it means that it is not upgraded yet?
timeline.author: strkkk
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -244,10 +244,12 @@ no-error-spring-cloud-gcp)
   CS_POM_VERSION=$(mvn -e -q -Dexec.executable='echo' -Dexec.args='${project.version}' \
                      --non-recursive org.codehaus.mojo:exec-maven-plugin:1.3.1:exec)
   echo CS_version: ${CS_POM_VERSION}
-  checkout_from https://github.com/spring-cloud/spring-cloud-gcp
+  checkout_from https://github.com/romani/spring-cloud-gcp
   cd .ci-temp/spring-cloud-gcp
+  git checkout romani-patch-1
   mvn -e checkstyle:check@checkstyle-validation -P full-checkstyle \
-   -Dpuppycrawl-tools-checkstyle.version=${CS_POM_VERSION}
+   -Dpuppycrawl-tools-checkstyle.version=${CS_POM_VERSION} \
+   -Dmaven-checkstyle-plugin.version=3.1.1

replies.bodyText:
As they upgrade to new their parent, we can remove this line probably.
For now it is required.
replies.author: romani
